Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to law enforcement agencies reporting sex offender changes of address to the division of criminal justice services
Summary: Requires law enforcement agencies to report sex offender changes of address within five business days to the division of criminal justice services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to reporting sex offender changes of address to the division of criminal justice services
